## Sources #############################################################################################################
# Collect sources.
set(SOURCES_CPP_PRIMER_THIRD_PARTY
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Person.cpp"
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Sales_data.cpp"
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Screen.cpp"
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Window_mgr.cpp"
    CACHE INTERNAL ""
)

## Includes ############################################################################################################
# Collect include directories.
set(INCLUDE_DIRS_CPP_PRIMER_THIRD_PARTY
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/inc"
    CACHE INTERNAL ""
)
